AI Description: FLTK (Fast, Light Toolkit) is a cross-platform C++ GUI toolkit for developing graphical user interfaces. It provides various widgets and tools for creating interactive and responsive graphical applications.
Core Features: Cross-Platform Gui Development, Multiple Widgets For Building Interfaces, Event Handling & Callback Functionality, Support For Opengl Integration, Lightweight & Fast Performance
General Tags: Gui Toolkit, Cross-Platform Development, C++ Library
